title: Project Riven skin idea
body:
So i was thinking there aren't really many riven skins and i really like the project skins, so i thought Project riven would be a pretty damn good skin (she already has a dash) and her animations would suit the project style animations very nicely not to mention Rivens 3rd Q knocks enemy's which works well with yasuo. just food for thought.
{{champion:92}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:114}}

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=xXEvolution7Xx,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=XVAsdiGs,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-19T15:47:31.379+0000)
>
> So i was thinking there aren't really many riven skins

lol

Riven already has a huge number of skins compared to a lot of other champions. On top of that, 5 skins were released recently, and if they wanted to make a PROJECT: Riven, they'd have to make ANOTHER 4. It won't be happening soon.
She only has 4?

Battlebunny, Championship, Redeemed, Crimson Elite, Dragonblade, Arcade. Legacy skins still count into it. What I'm saying, is that other champs don't have as many available skins, let alone legacy, plus Riven isn't played that much anyways.
Who needs project riven when theres championship riven.
lol what? there isnt a championship riven i looked?
there is {{champion:92}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
No.... i have looked? multiple times now, i even searched in the skins menu
It's a legacy :3{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
0.o idek what that means....
it means its limited time{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
I second that! Hahaha{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
riven already has 6 skins and we dont want to encourage people to play riven cos all they do is feed.
6? erm i just looked there is only 4...
Crimson elite, redeemed, battle bunny, championship, dragonblade and arcade. Thats 6
Dragon blade only just came out today, there still aint no championship skin though. not in oce anyway
dragon blade was out over a year ago
i started playing like 3 months ago....

> [{quoted}](name=xXEvolution7Xx,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=XVAsdiGs,comment-id=000200000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-02-03T12:43:11.319+0000)
>
> i started playing like 3 months ago....

Why are you worried about skins when you're still so new? Regardless, there IS a project riven skin as a custom skin. Google is your friend.

> [{quoted}](name=xXEvolution7Xx,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=XVAsdiGs,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-01-19T15:47:31.379+0000)
>
> So i was thinking there aren't really many riven skins 

That's the very same as saying Teemo doesn't have many skins...
She only has 4 skins?
YASSSSSSSS....(uo)
